markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Enduring Might](/Spells.aspx?ID=419)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 392 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** An attack or effect would deal damage to you.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you. You gain resistance equal to 8 plus your Strength modifier against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The resistance increases by 2.
name: Enduring Might
